thread.title_full: Piers Morgan to join Susanna Reid on Good Morning Britain - Haringey Independent - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Haringey Independent
title: Piers Morgan to join Susanna Reid on Good Morning Britain - Haringey Independent
text:
The former tabloid editor and TV presenter will join Susanna three days a week from November on the ITV breakfast show. He said: "I am very excited at the prospect of waking up at 3am every morning, and even more excited by the thought of how annoying Susanna is going to find me after a few months.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Haringey Independent.
